content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The travel insurance

fields.headline: The travel insurance
fields.bodyText: Policies to cover tourists who jet into space may soon be available from Bupa as the first space leisure flights with Virgin, become available in 2009. 'We provide insurance to people in 190 countries, so it wouldn't be a giant leap to add outer space to that list,' says Nick Potter, head of Bupa Travel. 'Obviously, we have to take into account various issues, such as the effect such a journey would have on the human body.'
